dcterms:description: The MixedEmotions project aims to implement an integrated Big Linked Data platform for emotion analysis across heterogeneous data sources, languages, and modalities, leveraging open access and proprietary data sources.
dcterms:title: MixedEmotions

dcterms:description: The project focuses on emotion analysis across various data sources, including user interactions through email, call centre interactions, social media comments, and facial expressions.
dcterms:title: User interactions

dcterms:description: The project involves analyzing user feedback across multiple languages, including text and speech, to understand emotional aspects of user interactions.
dcterms:title: User feedback

dcterms:description: The project aims to integrate emotion analysis across various data sources, including social media, to provide a comprehensive understanding of user interactions.
dcterms:title: Social media data

dcterms:description: The project focuses on analyzing user interactions through various modalities, including text, speech, and audio-visual content, to understand emotional aspects of user interactions.
dcterms:title: Multimodal data
